actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT CONCAT('  (',coalesce(TK.COUNT,0),')',AG.agent_level,' - ',AG.AGENT_NAME,'-',AG.AGENT_LANGUAGES,'-' ,AG.area_zone,' -LCT- ',tkt.closed_time) AS LABEL , AG.AGENT_id AS VALUE 
FROM agent AS AG 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(AGENT_ID) AS COUNT, AGENT_ID FROM TICKET WHERE TICKET_STATUS IN ('ASSIGNED','PICKED') AND to_char(created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:00.000')=to_char(current_date,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:00.000') GROUP BY AGENT_ID) AS TK ON TK.AGENT_ID=AG.AGENT_ID
left join (select to_char(max(closed_time),'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MI:SS') as closed_time, agent_id from ticket group by agent_id) as tkt on tkt.agent_id=ag.agent_id
where AG.agent_status!='INACTIVE' AND 
(CASE WHEN {{status_table.triggeredRow.project}}='ERP' then AG.agent_projects in ('SUPPORT','WHATSAPP') when {{status_table.triggeredRow.project}}='MIGRATION' then AG.agent_projects='MIGRATION' else AG.agent_projects='SUCCESS' end)
ORDER BY coalesce(TK.COUNT,0) ASC
